messages.ADD_ELEMENTS: Add a Node, Link, Facility or Doorway
messages.SHIFT_NODE_CLICK: Click two Nodes with holding "Shift" key
messages.DFGH_CLICK: Click map with holding "D","F","G" or "H" key
messages.SHIFT_POI_CLICK: Click Node and Facility with holding "Shift" key
messages.ADD_VERTEX: Add: Click link with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.DEL_VERTEX: Delete: Click vertex with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.OPT_CLICK: Click a node of link with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.OPT_CLICK2: Click a connection node with holding "option(Alt)" key
messages.SPLIT_LINK: Insert a link on a straight link
messages.SPLIT_LINK1: Click a straight link with holding "S" key
messages.COPY_POI1: Click a Facility with holding "C" key
messages.EDIT_ELEVATOR1: Link automatically snapped when connected nodes approaches to other
messages.EDIT_ELEVATOR2: Drag connected node with holding "Shift" key to resume snap
messages.ALIGN_LINKS: Align links in a straight line

ノード情報.接続リンクID: id of link the node is connected

リンクの情報.経路の種類:
1: sidewalk, 2: pedestrian street, 3: garden path, 4: coexistent road, 5: crosswalk, 6: crossing without crosswalk sign, 7: moving walkway, 8: free passage (inside Hakozaki 10th floor?), 9: railroad crossing, 10: elevator, 11: escalator, 12: stairs, 13: slope, 99: unknown-undefined,
> following codes are optional & not so usual
15: shopping street, 16: shopping street entrance, 17: shortcut path, 18: crowded/to avoid path, 19: tourist routes, 20: snow and rain avoided
リンクの情報.供用制限曜日: service closing days (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) if exists. Collection if several.
リンクの情報.方向性: 0: bidirectional, 1: towards end point, 2: towards start point, 9: unknown
リンクの情報.通行制限: 0: free walk, 1: restricted access, 2: fee required, 9: unknown
リンクの情報.縦断勾配1: Maximum slope value (%) along the link
リンクの情報.縦断勾配2: 0: no problem, even with manual wheelchair, 1: difficulty for manual wheelchair, but not for electrical, 2: difficulty even with electrical wheelchair
リンクの情報.横断勾配緯度: Latitude location for max. crosswise slope
リンクの情報.横断勾配経度: Longitude location for max. crosswise slope
リンクの情報.路面状況: 0: no problem, 1: dirt, 2: gravel, 3: other, 9: unknown
リンクの情報.段差: 0: less than 2cm, 1: 2~5cm, 2: 5~10cm, 3: more than 10cm, 9: unknown (assign max bump height for whole link)
リンクの情報.最小階段段数: number of steps along a stairway
リンクの情報.最大階段段数: (optional) max. number of steps when different ways along stairs
リンクの情報.手すり: 0: no, 1: on the right, 2: on the left, 3: both sides, 9: unknown (link direction - start node to end node)
リンクの情報.視覚障害者誘導用ブロック: 0: no, 1: yes, 9: unknown (tactile paving along the path/link)
リンクの情報.補助施設の設置状況: 0: no, 1: escalator with wheelchair step, 2: stairlift, 3: vertical lift platform, 4: voice guidance device, 6: other feature, 9: unknown (do not include human assistance)
リンクの情報.エレベーター種別: 0: not included, 1: braille and audio, 2: wheelchair, 3: 1&2, 9: unknown
リンクの情報.信号の有無: 0: no signal, 1: staggered signal, 2: with push-button, 3: other, 9: unknown
リンクの情報.日交通量: fill only when data provided from census area, otherwise leave blank
リンクの情報.エスコートゾーン: 0: no, 1: yes, 9: unknown (tactile paving along crosswalk intersection)
リンクの情報.リンク延長: describe extension of the link (unnecessary for elevator and similar)

出入口情報.扉の種類: 0: no, 1: automatic, 2: automatic (with push-button), 3: manual sliding, 4: manual hinged, 5: revolving door, 6: other, 9: unknown

公共施設の情報.供用制限曜日: service closing days (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) if exists. Collection if several.
公共施設の情報.多目的トイレ: 0: no, 1: yes (no colostomy support), 2: yes (support for colostomy)

公共用トイレの情報.多目的トイレ: 0: no, 1: yes (no colostomy support), 2: yes (support for colostomy)
公共用トイレの情報.供用制限曜日: toilet closing days (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) if exists. Collection if several.

指定避難所の情報.多目的トイレ: 0: no, 1: yes (no colostomy support), 2: yes (support for colostomy)

病院の情報.診療科目: 1: internal medicine, 2: pediatrics, 3: surgery, 4: obstetrics and gynecology, 8: others
病院の情報.休診日: closing days (1: Monday to 7: Sunday) if exists. Collection if several.
病院の情報.多目的トイレ: 0: no, 1: yes (no colostomy support), 2: yes (support for colostomy)

area.hulop_area_name: specify area name (building name, area name, etc.)
